entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. A few showers beginning late this evening. Risk of thunderstorms this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:17 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Showers beginning late in the afternoon. 70 percent chance of showers near Port Renfrew in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 20 late in the morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:17 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then clearing. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:17 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023
